text:
[Verse 1]
Feeling the cool night air
Stars twinkling up so high
Dancing without a care
Under the midnight sky

[Verse 2]
Feet moving to the beat
Shadows in the moonlight
Heart pounding with each step
Everything feels so right

[Chorus]
Under the midnight sky
We let our spirits fly
No worries no goodbyes
Just you and I

[Verse 3]
Laughing till we can't breathe
Hands held in the dark night
Moments we won't believe
Under the silver light

[Bridge]
Dreams come alive tonight
Colors that shine so bright
Lost in each other's eyes
Under the endless sky

[Chorus]
Under the midnight sky
We let our spirits fly
No worries no goodbyes
Just you and I
title: Under the Midnight Sky
